list_definition.definition: trust or belief in someone’s ability

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I have great confidence in you.

list_definition.definition: belief and faith in one’s own ability

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She shows a great deal of confidence for her age.
